intro.start: const Ceiara = ( name, passion ) => { console.log(`${name} has a passion for ${passion}`); }

header.name: Ceiara Madrigal.
header.usp: I build meaningful experiences through code.

paragraph: Cal Poly Pomona Computer Science graduate and an aspiring software developer with diverse language and framework experience--driven by lifelong passion for learning and a desire to make a lasting impact.
